title: Freedom4All
author: Freedom4All
content: Hello!I offer space on my website to place paid blog posts/ads for good initiatives related to cryptocurrencies, privacy, and other goods or services that align with the readers.The website is aimed at Dutch-speaking readers. It is a news and opinion website, set up on October 1, 2019.The website has an average of a thousand unique visitors per day. 3.600+ Post Notification Subscribers. (The inactive devices are filtered out on a monthly basis.) and a Twitter account attached to it where all articles are shared.Casino-related content might be possible. But not too overwhelming. And it must be legal.Depending on the wishes and the length, the normal price for a blog post is $140.But there are many possibilities and it depends on the niche.The website is:https://commonsensetv.nlEdit: If this is not the proper place to post this offer, let me know. I posted it in services but I think that's not the right place to post this.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 14, 2023, 09:37:27 PMEdit: If this is not the proper place to post this offer, let me know. I posted it in services but I think that's not the right place to post this.This is not a proper section to post your service if you check out the pin thread you will see this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2028417.msg25803869#msg25803869And how come, a service is not the right place to post your service when it's a dedicated section for everything related to service, obviously you are section shopping to promote your service.
